author: AP
title: Atlético cuts player salaries by 70% during virus crisis
description: Atlético cuts player salaries by 70% during virus crisis
content:
Atlético Madrid says it has reached an agreement with its players and coaching staff to reduce their salaries by 70% while competitions are stopped during the coronavirus pandemic.
Atlético announced the agreement on Thursday and said it is temporarily suspe… [+813 chars]
